name: Snorunt
description: The Snow Hat Pokémon. Snorunt survives by eating only snow and ice. Old folklore claims that a house visited by this Pokémon is sure to prosper for many generations to come.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: At the end of each long rest, this Pokémon rerolls on the nature table, replacing its nature with the result until the next long rest.
